title: The Wardstone Chronicles / The Last Apprentice - Joseph Delaney
description:
This is the entire collection of The Wardstone Chronicles (UK) / The Last Apprentice (US). Titles follow the US version, but they are all the same. Best edition I have ever found, with no spelling mistakes or missing paragraphs. Titles are as follows:

1.  The Spook's Apprentice (The Last Apprentice: Revenge of the Witch) - 2004
2.  The Spook's Curse (The Last Apprentice: Curse of the Bane) - 2005
3.  The Spook's Secret (The Last Apprentice: Night of the Soul Stealer) - 2006
4.  The Spook's Battle (The Last Apprentice: Attack of the Fiend) - 2007
5.  The Spook's Mistake (The Last Apprentice: Wrath of the Bloodeye) - 2008
6.  The Spook's Sacrifice (The Last Apprentice: Clash of the Demons) - 2009
7.  The Spook's Nightmare (The Last Apprentice: Rise of the Huntress) - 2010
8.  The Spook's Destiny (The Last Apprentice: Rage of the Fallen) - 2011
9.  Spook's: I Am Grimalkin (The Last Apprentice: Grimalkin The Witch Assassin) - 2011
10. The Spook's Blood (The Last Apprentice: Lure of the Dead ) - 2012
11. Spook's: Slither's Tale (The Last Apprentice: Slither) - 2013
12. Spook's: Alice (The Last Apprentice: I Am Alice) - 2013
13. The Spook's Revenge (The Last Apprentice: Fury of the Seventh Son) - 2014

14. Extras
~ The Spook's Tale And Other Horrors - 2009
~ The Spook's Stories: Witches (The Last Apprentice - A Coven of Witches) - 2009
~ The Spook's Bestiary (The Last Apprentice - The Spook's Bestiary: The Guide to Creatures of the Dark) - 2010

Format provided is MOBI. Enjoy
